```{r}
# ?QC_ReferenceLibrary

ReferenceInstrument <- 64

InstrumentList <- c(54, 48, 38, 30, 22, 14,
78, "48_S", "48_A", 184, "182_DUV", 147, 112, 86, 
55, "52_7L", "52_6L", 51)

# x <- InstrumentList[7]
x <- InstrumentList[10]

DetectorConversion <- function(x, ReferenceInstrument){
    Reference <- Luciernaga:::InstrumentReferences(ReferenceInstrument) |> select(-Instrument)
    ReferenceFluors <- Reference |> pull(Fluorophore) |> unique()
    Instrument <- Luciernaga:::InstrumentReferences(x) |> select(-Instrument)
    InstrumentFluors <- Instrument |> pull(Fluorophore) |> unique()
    DifferentFluors <- setdiff(InstrumentFluors, ReferenceFluors)
    DifferentFluors
    
    if (length(DifferentFluors) == 0){
    TheExit <- NULL    
    return(TheExit)
    }


}
```
